name: Florida Flight Center
about: Florida Flight Center, based in Sarasota, Florida, at Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport, has been serving pilots since 1996. We offer personalized training programs, blending formal instruction with one-on-one attention, catering to both professional pilots and those seeking their first type rating. Our instructors are active professional pilots, providing real-world experience and proven training methods to ensure a pleasant and effective learning experience. We emphasize safety, conducting all training in actual aircraft to enhance proficiency. With flexible scheduling and the option for on-site training, we accommodate various needs. Located in a tropical climate, our training environment is ideal year-round, offering a unique blend of professional training and leisure activities. Our commitment to safety, professionalism, and personalized training makes Florida Flight Center an excellent choice for aspiring and seasoned pilots alike.
